attributes.action: Prosecute MP's who have falsely been claiming expenses via deception & fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would ask that MP's who have been caught fraudulently claiming expenses be prosecuted and loose their jobs. If a member of the public had committed offences such as these we would have been prosecuted so why not MP's? MP's are supposed to be role models and representatives of our country and this is unacceptable. This is also taxpayers money being wasted in a disgusting manner whilst there is a credit crunch & people are being made unemployed.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
